value.title: Yandex Self Driving Group Gets $150 Million, Will Bring Autonomous Vehicles To U.S.

Yandex NV is going to invest $150 million into Yandex SDG ($100 million in equity, $50 million as a convertible loan) and Yandex NV will keep an eye on the autonomous vehicle technology progress and will keep reporting Yandex SDG's results in Yandex NV's "Other Bets and Experiments" segment.
